proc.name: Seller_getList
proc.query: SELECT Seller.A3_COD AS sellerId, LTRIM(Seller.A3_NOME) AS sellerName FROM SA3010 AS Seller WHERE Seller.D_E_L_E_T_ != '*' ORDER BY sellerName

proc.name: Seller_getDataBySellerId
proc.query: SELECT Seller.A3_COD AS sellerId, LTRIM(Seller.A3_NOME) AS sellerName, LTRIM(Seller.A3_NREDUZ) AS sellerShortName FROM SA3010 AS Seller WHERE Seller.A3_COD = ''{0}''

proc.name: SalesOrder_getList
proc.query:
SELECT DISTINCT salesOrder.C5_NUM AS salesOrderId, salesOrder.C5_FILIAL AS branchId,
CASE WHEN salesOrder.C5_NOTA <> '''' THEN ''600'' ELSE
CASE WHEN ISNULL(BloqueioCredito.Situacao, 0) = 1 THEN ''300'' ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(BloqueioEstoque.Situacao, 0) = 1 THEN ''400'' ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(OrdemDeSeparacao.Situacao, 0) = 1 THEN ''500'' ELSE ''100'' END END END END AS statusId,
salesOrder.C5_EMISSAO AS saleDate, salesOrder.C5_XTIPO AS reservationTypeId, salesOrder.C5_CLIENTE AS customerId, salesOrder.C5_LOJACLI AS unitId, customer.A1_CGC AS Cnpj, customer.A1_NOME AS Name, customer.A1_NREDUZ AS unitName, invoice.F2_CHVNFE AS invoiceKey
FROM SC5010 AS salesOrder
LEFT JOIN SA1010 AS customer ON customer.A1_COD = salesOrder.C5_CLIENTE AND customer.A1_LOJA = salesOrder.C5_LOJACLI
LEFT JOIN SF2010 AS invoice ON invoice.F2_DOC = salesOrder.C5_NOTA AND invoice.F2_SERIE = salesOrder.C5_SERIE AND invoice.F2_FILIAL = salesOrder.C5_FILIAL AND invoice.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*''
LEFT JOIN SE1010 AS receipt ON receipt.E1_PEDIDO = C5_NUM AND E1_TIPO = ''RA'' AND E1_FILIAL = C5_FILIAL AND receipt.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*''
OUTER APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 1 AS Situacao FROM SC9010 WHERE SC9010.C9_PEDIDO = salesOrder.C5_NUM AND SC9010.C9_FILIAL = salesOrder.C5_FILIAL AND SC9010.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' AND SC9010.C9_BLCRED <> '''') BloqueioCredito
OUTER APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 1 AS Situacao FROM SC9010 WHERE SC9010.C9_PEDIDO = salesOrder.C5_NUM AND SC9010.C9_FILIAL = salesOrder.C5_FILIAL AND SC9010.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' AND SC9010.C9_BLEST <> '''') BloqueioEstoque
OUTER APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 1 AS Situacao FROM SC9010 WHERE SC9010.C9_PEDIDO = salesOrder.C5_NUM AND SC9010.C9_FILIAL = salesOrder.C5_FILIAL AND SC9010.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' AND SC9010.C9_ORDSEP <> '''') OrdemDeSeparacao
WHERE (salesOrder.C5_VEND1 = ''{0}'' ) AND (salesOrder.C5_NOTA IS NULL OR invoice.F2_EMISSAO IS NULL OR invoice.F2_EMISSAO BETWEEN ''{1}'' AND ''{2}'' ) AND (salesOrder.C5_CLIENTE = ''{3}'' OR ''{4}'' = ''000000'') AND (salesOrder.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'') AND (salesOrder.C5_FILIAL IN (''103'',''104''))
ORDER BY salesOrder.C5_NUM, salesOrder.C5_FILIAL

proc.name: Product_getListByProductGroupId
proc.query: SELECT Product.B1_COD AS productId, Product.B1_DESC AS productDescription, Product.B1_UM AS productMeasureUnit, Product.B1_PRV1 AS productPrice FROM SB1010 AS Product WHERE Product.B1_GRUPO > ''{0}'' AND Product.B1_TIPO > ''PA'' AND Product.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' ORDER BY productDescription

proc.name: ProductStock_getListByProductId
proc.query:
SELECT Stock.B2_COD AS productId, Stock.B2_FILIAL AS branchId, ''PE'' AS typeId, ''Estoque'' AS typeDescription, CAST('''' AS VARCHAR(06)) AS requestId, CAST('''' AS VARCHAR(04)) AS requestItemId, CAST('''' AS VARCHAR(08)) AS requestDate, Stock.B2_QATU - Stock.B2_QACLASS - Stock.B2_RESERVA AS productQuantity
FROM SB2010 AS Stock
WHERE Stock.B2_COD = ''{0}'' AND Stock.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' AND Stock.B2_FILIAL IN (''103'', ''104'') AND Stock.B2_QATU - Stock.B2_QACLASS - Stock.B2_RESERVA > 0
UNION SELECT Stock.C1_PRODUTO AS productId, Stock.C1_FILIAL AS branchId, ''SC'' AS typeId, ''S.C. '' + Stock.C1_NUM + '' '' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(Stock.C1_DATPRF AS DATE), 103) AS typeDescription, Stock.C1_NUM AS requestId, Stock.C1_ITEM AS requestItemId, Stock.C1_DATPRF AS requestDate, Stock.C1_QUANT - ISNULL(SUM(Reservation.ZZ_QUANT), 0) AS productQuantity
FROM SC1010 AS Stock
LEFT JOIN SZZ010 AS Reservation ON Reservation.ZZ_PO_NUM = Stock.C1_NUM + Stock.C1_ITEM AND Reservation.ZZ_CANCEL <> ''T'' AND Reservation.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*''
WHERE Stock.C1_PRODUTO = ''{1}'' AND Stock.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' AND Stock.C1_FILIAL IN (''103'', ''104'')
GROUP BY Stock.C1_PRODUTO, Stock.C1_FILIAL, Stock.C1_NUM, Stock.C1_DATPRF, Stock.C1_ITEM, Stock.C1_DATPRF, Stock.C1_QUANT
HAVING ISNULL(SUM(Reservation.ZZ_QUANT), 0) < Stock.C1_QUANT
UNION SELECT DISTINCT ''{2}'' AS productId, Stock.B2_FILIAL AS branchId, ''EN'' AS typeId, ''Encomenda'' AS typeDescription, CAST('''' AS VARCHAR(06)) AS requestId, CAST('''' AS VARCHAR(04)) AS requestItemId, CAST('''' AS VARCHAR(08)) AS requestDate, 0 AS productQuantity
FROM SB2010 AS Stock
WHERE Stock.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' AND Stock.B2_COD = ''{3}'' AND Stock.B2_FILIAL IN (''103'', ''104'')
ORDER BY branchId, typeId, requestId, requestItemId

proc.name: ProductGroup_getList
proc.query: SELECT DISTINCT Product.B1_GRUPO AS productGroupId, LTRIM(ProductGroup.BM_DESC) AS description FROM SB1010 AS Product LEFT JOIN SBM010 AS ProductGroup ON ProductGroup.BM_GRUPO = Product.B1_GRUPO WHERE Product.B1_TIPO = 'PA' AND Product.D_E_L_E_T_ != '*' AND ProductGroup.D_E_L_E_T_ != '*' ORDER BY description

proc.name: Payment_getList
proc.query: SELECT Payment.E4_CODIGO AS paymentId, LTRIM(Payment.E4_DESCRI) AS paymentDescription FROM SE4010 AS Payment WHERE Payment.D_E_L_E_T_ != '*' ORDER BY paymentDescription

proc.name: Customer_getListBySellerId
proc.query: SELECT DISTINCT Customer.A1_COD AS customerId, LTRIM(Customer.A1_NOME) AS customerName FROM SA1010 AS Customer WHERE Customer.A1_VEND = ''{0}'' AND Customer.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' ORDER BY customerName

proc.name: Customer_getUnitListByCustomerId
proc.query:
SELECT Customer.A1_LOJA AS unitId, Customer.A1_CGC AS cnpj, LTRIM(Customer.A1_NREDUZ) AS name, Customer.A1_MUN AS city, Customer.A1_EST AS state
FROM SA1010 AS Customer
WHERE Customer.A1_COD = ''{0}'' AND Customer.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' ORDER BY name

proc.name: Customer_getDataByCustomerId
proc.query:
SELECT Customer.A1_COD AS customerId, Customer.A1_LOJA AS unitId, LTRIM(Customer.A1_NOME) AS name, LTRIM(Customer.A1_NREDUZ) AS unitName, Customer.A1_CGC AS cnpj, Customer.A1_INSCR AS stateRegistration, Customer.A1_INSCRM AS districtRegistration, Customer.A1_PFISICA AS idCard, Customer.A1_END AS address, Customer.A1_MUN AS city, Customer.A1_EST AS state, Customer.A1_BAIRRO AS district, Customer.A1_CEP AS zipCode, Customer.A1_DDI AS intAreaCode, Customer.A1_DDD AS areaCode, Customer.A1_TEL AS phoneNumber, Customer.A1_FAX AS faxNumber, Customer.A1_PAIS AS countryId, Country.YA_DESCR AS countryName, Customer.A1_ENDCOB AS inovicingAddress, Customer.A1_ENDENT AS deliveryAddress, Customer.A1_ENDREC AS receptionAddress, Customer.A1_CONTATO AS contactName, Customer.A1_TPFRET AS freightTypeId, Customer.A1_TRANSP AS carrierId, Carrier.A4_NOME AS carrierName, Customer.A1_COND AS paymentId, Payment.E4_DESCRI AS paymentDescription, Customer.A1_VEND AS sellerId, Seller.A3_NOME AS sellerName
FROM SA1010 AS Customer
LEFT JOIN SYA010 AS Country ON Country.YA_CODGI = Customer.A1_PAIS LEFT JOIN SA3010 AS Seller ON Seller.A3_COD = Customer.A1_VEND LEFT JOIN SE4010 AS Payment ON Payment.E4_CODIGO = Customer.A1_COND LEFT JOIN SA4010 AS Carrier ON Carrier.A4_COD = Customer.A1_TRANSP
WHERE Customer.A1_COD = ''{0}'' AND Customer.A1_LOJA = ''{1}'' AND Customer.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*''

proc.name: Currency_getListByDate
proc.query:
SELECT M.currencyId, M.currencySymbol, M.currencyName, M.currencyDate, M.currencyRate
FROM
(SELECT TOP 1 ''1'' AS currencyId ,''R$'' AS currencySymbol ,''REAL'' AS currencyName , Currency.M2_DATA AS currencyDate ,ISNULL(Currency.M2_MOEDA1, 1) AS currencyRate
FROM SM2010 AS Currency
WHERE Currency.M2_DATA <= ''{0}''
ORDER BY M2_DATA DESC
UNION
SELECT TOP 1 ''2'' AS currencyId ,''US$'' AS currencySymbol ,''DOLAR'' AS currencyName ,Currency.M2_DATA AS currencyDate ,ISNULL(Currency.M2_MOEDA2, 1) AS currencyRate
FROM SM2010 AS Currency
WHERE Currency.M2_DATA <= ''{1}'' AND Currency.M2_MOEDA2 > 0
ORDER BY M2_DATA DESC) M

proc.name: Currency_getDataByCurrencyId
proc.query:
SELECT M.currencyId, M.currencySymbol, M.currencyName, M.currencyDate, M.currencyRate
FROM
(SELECT TOP 1 ''1'' AS currencyId ,''R$'' AS currencySymbol ,''REAL'' AS currencyName , Currency.M2_DATA AS currencyDate ,ISNULL(Currency.M2_MOEDA1, 1) AS currencyRate
FROM SM2010 AS Currency
WHERE Currency.M2_DATA <= ''{0}''
ORDER BY M2_DATA DESC
UNION
SELECT TOP 1 ''2'' AS currencyId ,''US$'' AS currencySymbol ,''DOLAR'' AS currencyName ,Currency.M2_DATA AS currencyDate ,ISNULL(Currency.M2_MOEDA2, 1) AS currencyRate
FROM SM2010 AS Currency
WHERE Currency.M2_DATA <= ''{1}'' AND Currency.M2_MOEDA2 > 0
ORDER BY M2_DATA DESC) M
WHERE M.currencyId = ''{2}''

proc.name: Carrier_getList
proc.query:
SELECT Carrier.A4_COD AS carrierId, LTRIM(Carrier.A4_NOME) AS carrierName
FROM SA4010 AS Carrier
WHERE Carrier.D_E_L_E_T_ <> '*'
ORDER BY carrierName

proc.name: Carrier_getDataByCarrierId
proc.query:
SELECT Carrier.A4_COD AS carrierId, LTRIM(Carrier.A4_NOME) AS carrierName, LTRIM(Carrier.A4_NREDUZ) AS carrierShortName
FROM SA4010 AS Carrier
WHERE Carrier.A4_COD = ''{0}''

proc.name: Authentication_getUserByEmail
proc.query: SELECT Seller.A3_COD AS sellerId, LTRIM(Seller.A3_NOME) AS sellerName, Seller.A3_XSENHA AS sellerPassword FROM SA3010 AS Seller WHERE Seller.D_E_L_E_T_ <> ''*'' AND UPPER(Seller.A3_EMAIL) = UPPER(''{0}'')

proc.name: Authentication_getHash
proc.query:
SELECT Carrier.A4_COD AS carrierId, LTRIM(Carrier.A4_NOME) AS carrierName, LTRIM(Carrier.A4_NREDUZ) AS carrierShortName
